I now have rendering of #rstats #rspatial mapview maps under control (though totally unflexible still):

library(mapview)
mapviewOptions(fgb = FALSE)

m1 = mapview(franconia, zcol = "district")
m2 = mapview(breweries, cex = "founded", col.regions = "forestgreen")
